name: To Ward Weakness
title: Kuki Shinobu: To Ward Weakness

attributes.source: Reward for inviting Kuki Shinobu to a duel at The Cat's Tail and achieving all corresponding challenge objectives

skills.desc: Combat Action: When your active character is Kuki Shinobu, equip this card. After Kuki Shinobu equips this card, immediately use Gyoei Narukami Kariyama Rite once. When Kuki Shinobu, who has this card equipped, is defeated, she will not be defeated but will instead heal herself to 1 HP. (Once per Round) If Kuki Shinobu, who has this card equipped, does not have more than 5 HP, deal +1 DMG. (You must have Kuki Shinobu in your deck to add this card to your deck.)

(Once per Round) If Kuki Shinobu, who has this card equipped, does not have more than 5 HP, deal +1 DMG. (You must have Kuki Shinobu in your deck to add this card to your deck.)

inPlayDescription:
When Kuki Shinobu, who has this card equipped, is defeated, she will not be defeated but will instead heal herself to 1 HP. (Once per Round)
If Kuki Shinobu, who has this card equipped, does not have more than 5 HP, deal +1 DMG.
